note.p: Death: Gawthorp Hall, near Burnley, Lancashire, the seat of his son-in-law, Sir Richard Shuttleworth (24 March 1687)
Education: Magdalen College, Oxford; BA (1641), MA (1644), MB (1647/8), MD (1652); incorporated at Cambridge (1673)
Career: Fellow of Magdalen (1642-1667); Deputy Lecturer in Anatomy at Oxford (1657); President, Magdalen College, Oxford (1672-1687); Vice-Chancellor of Oxford (1676)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Foster; Hunter
Notes: Venn has FRCP (1659). Proposed by John Graunt
